::Dion::

Dion plants his feet firmly to avoid staggering as Grimlock pushes him out of the way, forgetting about Crotale, then growling and tapping the Dinobot on the shoulder.

"Why don't you try saying 'please'?" he asks in a very hostile voice, a large fist snapping out at Grimlock's face.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Grimlock walks by Dion, and whatever is in the chamber. He has things on
> his mind. He pushes Dion out of the way, as he walks by. "Out of the way
> bum." Grimlock says rudely.
